title: Admin views the employee list
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can open the Employees page and see a list of employees.

title: Admin opens an employee details page from the list
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can navigate from the employees list to a specific employee details page.

steps.description: Click on the first employee row in the list

title: Admin creates a new employee with valid required fields
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can create a new employee and see it appear in the employee list.

title: Admin attempts to create an employee with missing required fields
description: Verifies the create employee form shows visible validation errors when required fields are missing.

title: Admin edits an employee salary and saves
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can update an employee salary and see a visible confirmation.

steps.description: Click on the first employee row in the list

title: Admin deletes an employee from the details page
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can delete an employee and see a visible success message or return to list without the record.

steps.description: Click on the first employee row in the list

title: Employee cannot access another employee’s profile (data isolation)
description: Verifies a non-admin user is blocked from viewing another employee’s details page.

title: Employee cannot edit another employee’s salary
description: Verifies a non-admin user cannot reach an edit experience for another employee and sees an access denied message.

title: CHEF records bulk attendance for a specific date with overtime hours
description: Verifies a CHEF can open the Pointage page, enter a date, bulk mark employees as PRESENT with overtime, and see the saved records displayed.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-10" in the attendance date picker

title: CHEF saves attendance and sees a success confirmation and rows for the chosen date
description: Verifies saving attendance shows a visible success state and the attendance list updates for the selected date.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-10" in the attendance date picker
Verify element "Attendance records list/table" is visible

title: CHEF fetches attendance for a date by changing the date filter
description: Verifies the CHEF can switch the date filter and the UI refreshes to show records for the newly selected date.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-09" in the attendance date picker

title: CHEF corrects an existing attendance record by changing status to CONGE
description: Verifies the CHEF can edit an existing record to CONGE and the updated status is visible in the list.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-10" in the attendance date picker
Click on an existing employee attendance row to open editing controls

title: CHEF correction is persisted and visible after saving
description: Verifies that after editing an attendance record and saving, the new status remains visible in the list for that date.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-10" in the attendance date picker

title: CHEF marks an old record as MALADIE (historical patch)
description: Verifies the CHEF can change a past date’s attendance record to MALADIE and see the updated status in the UI.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-01-15" in the attendance date picker
Verify element "Attendance records list/table" is visible

title: Duplicate bulk attendance for the same date shows a visible conflict/error message
description: Verifies that attempting to save attendance for a date where records already exist shows a visible error and does not create duplicates in the UI.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Pointage" in the navigation menu
Select the date "2026-02-10" in the attendance date picker

title: Non-CHEF user cannot access CHEF Pointage workflow (authorization blocked in UI)
description: Verifies that a user without CHEF privileges cannot use the bulk pointage interface and sees an access denied or lack of bulk controls.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button

title: Admin views the Salary Advances (Avances) finance page and sees the pending list section
description: Verifies the admin can open the finances advances screen and the pending advances area is visible.

steps.description: Click on "Admin" in the main navigation (or user role menu) if visible
Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation

title: Admin filters advances by PENDING status
description: Verifies filtering the advances list to show pending requests only.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "PENDING" from the status filter dropdown

title: Admin approves a pending salary advance request
description: Verifies an admin can change an advance status from PENDING to APPROVED from the UI.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "PENDING" from the status filter dropdown
Click on the first "Approve" button in the pending advances list

title: Admin rejects a pending salary advance request
description: Verifies an admin can reject a pending advance request and the UI reflects the new status.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "PENDING" from the status filter dropdown
Click on the first "Reject" button in the pending advances list

title: Non-admin user cannot approve an advance (permission denied)
description: Verifies a non-admin role (e.g., chef) is blocked from changing advance status and sees an access/forbidden message.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "PENDING" from the status filter dropdown
Click on the first "Approve" button if it is visible

title: Admin views APPROVED advances and sees them listed
description: Verifies the approved advances list is accessible and shows approved items.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "APPROVED" from the status filter dropdown

title: Admin verifies approved advance appears as a payroll deduction indicator
description: Verifies the UI indicates that approved advances are included in payroll deductions (high-level check).

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Select "APPROVED" from the status filter dropdown

title: Employee submits a salary advance request with an invalid negative amount and sees validation error
description: Verifies the UI prevents submitting a negative advance amount and shows an error message.

steps.description: Click on "Finances" in the dashboard navigation
Click on the "New advance" or "Request advance" button

title: Admin can view dashboard statistics summary cards
description: Verifies an admin can open the Admin Dashboard and see aggregated statistics values displayed.

title: Admin dashboard shows overtime and approved advances metrics
description: Verifies the Admin Dashboard includes overtime hours and approved advances metrics in the visible summary area.

title: Admin can see chart-ready overtime-by-employee section
description: Verifies the Admin Dashboard shows a visible section for overtime grouped by employee (chart/table) with employee names and hours.

steps.description: Verify text "Overtime by Employee" is visible
Verify element "overtime by employee chart" is visible

title: Admin can apply a valid date range filter and see updated stats
description: Verifies the admin can set a start and end date on the dashboard and the statistics area updates to reflect the selected range.

title: Admin sees a validation message when date range is missing
description: Verifies the dashboard prevents loading stats (or shows an error) when start and end date are required but not provided.

steps.description: Click the "Apply" or "Refresh" button for dashboard statistics

title: Admin sees an error when end date is before start date
description: Verifies the dashboard handles an invalid date range by showing a visible validation/error message instead of displaying misleading stats.

steps.description: Verify text "Invalid date range" is visible

title: Chef role can access permitted dashboard statistics view
description: Verifies a Chef user can open the dashboard statistics view when permitted by RBAC and sees the statistics section.

title: Non-admin user is blocked from admin dashboard statistics
description: Verifies a non-admin user cannot access the admin dashboard statistics page/section and sees a visible access-denied message or lacks the admin dashboard entry.

title: View chat contacts list with last message previews
description: Verifies the user can open the Messaging page and see a list of chat contacts with preview information.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Verify element "Chat contacts list" is visible

title: Open a conversation from contacts and view message thread
description: Verifies selecting a contact opens the conversation thread and displays messages.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Click on the first contact in the chat contacts list

title: Send a message to an existing contact
description: Verifies the user can type and send a message and see it appear in the conversation.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Click on the first contact in the chat contacts list
Type "Hello, this is a test message" into the message input field
Verify text "Hello, this is a test message" is visible

title: Unread messages indicator is visible and decreases after reading a chat
description: Verifies unread count/badge is shown and is cleared or reduced after opening a chat with unread messages.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Click on a contact that shows an unread badge
Verify element "Unread badge" is not visible

title: Search or filter chat contacts (if available)
description: Verifies the user can narrow the chat contacts list using the contacts search field.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Verify element "Contacts search field" is visible
Type "a" into the contacts search field
Verify element "Chat contacts list" is visible

title: Prevent sending an empty message
description: Verifies the UI blocks sending when the message input is empty and shows a visible validation state.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Click on the first contact in the chat contacts list
Verify text "Message cannot be empty" is visible

title: Gracefully handle sending to an invalid/non-existent recipient (UI error)
description: Verifies the UI displays a visible error when a message cannot be delivered to the selected recipient.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation
Click on a contact labeled "Unknown" (if present) in the chat contacts list
Type "Test delivery" into the message input field
Verify text "User not found" is visible

title: Admin can access the Reports page from the Admin Dashboard
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can open the Reports (Rapports) page in the admin dashboard UI.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu

title: Admin generates a monthly Payroll report successfully
description: Verifies an admin can generate a monthly payroll report from the Reports UI and sees a success state indicating the report is ready.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu
Select "Payroll" from the report type dropdown
Select "2026-02" from the month picker or month dropdown

title: Admin sees a generated report listed with an accessible download control
description: Verifies that after generating a report, the report appears in the reports list with a visible Download option.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu
Select "Payroll" from the report type dropdown
Select "2026-02" from the month picker or month dropdown

title: Admin attempts to generate a report with an invalid month format and sees validation error
description: Verifies the UI prevents or rejects invalid month input and shows a visible validation or error message.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu
Select "Payroll" from the report type dropdown
Type "2026/02" into the month input field

title: Admin tries to generate a report without selecting a month and sees a required-field error
description: Verifies the month field is required and the UI shows a visible error when generating without a month.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu
Select "Payroll" from the report type dropdown

title: Admin generates a report and sees a loading/in-progress state while it is being created
description: Verifies the UI shows visible progress feedback (loading text/spinner) after clicking Generate.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
Click on "Rapports" in the admin sidebar or admin navigation menu
Select "Payroll" from the report type dropdown
Select "2026-02" from the month picker or month dropdown

title: Non-admin user is blocked from generating reports (permission error shown)
description: Verifies a non-admin authenticated user cannot generate reports and sees a visible permission/forbidden message in the UI.

steps.description: Click on the "Sign in" or "Login" button
